title: fix(ui): add cursor-pointer to select all buttons
author: fisventurous

gist.headline: Pointing the way
gist.blurb: We've polished the UI interactions in the permissions settings so buttons feel more like buttons.
gist.summary: Added cursor-pointer indicators to 'Select All' and category toggle buttons in the account permissions UI.
gist.impact: Users will see the standard hand cursor when hovering over these controls, improving UI clarity.
gist.visual_concept: A tiny bee polishing a UI button with a mouse cursor nearby. Represents the UI polish and the specific cursor change.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee polishing a pixelated UI button with a large mouse cursor pointer nearby. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee adjusting toggle switches on a retro dashboard control panel. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Unpacking. Pixel text 'SETTINGS'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
